PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-02402021-03-26,  FIN,  ,  , 
ActCanadian International Trade Tribunal Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canadian International Trade Tribunal Procurement Inquiry Regulations
PrecisRegulations amending the CANADIAN INTERNATIONAL TRADE TRIBUNAL (CITT) PROCUREMENT INQUIRY REGULATIONS in order to incorporate a reference to the Agreement on Trade Continuity between Canada and the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland so that the CITT may conduct procurement inquiries in respect of complaints by potential Canadian and U.K. suppliers concerning covered federal procurements.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0069 Publication Date: 2021-04-14
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Canadian International Trade Tribunal Procurement Inquiry Regulations
precis: Regulations amending the CANADIAN INTERNATIONAL TRADE TRIBUNAL (CITT) PROCUREMENT INQUIRY REGULATIONS in order to incorporate a reference to the Agreement on Trade Continuity between Canada and the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland so that the CITT may conduct procurement inquiries in respect of complaints by potential Canadian and U.K. suppliers concerning covered federal procurements.
